remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件編輯 按鈕按一下時前,項目進入編輯模式。The control raises the event when an Edit button is clicked, but before the item enters edit mode. (編輯 按鈕是一個按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Edit"。)這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消編輯作業的事件處理方法。(An Edit button is a button whose `CommandName` property set to "Edit".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the edit operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此物件可讓您判斷正在編輯之項目的索引，並指出應該取消編輯作業。This object enables you to determine the index of the item that is being edited, and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled. 若要取消的編輯作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the edit operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消編輯作業，當使用者嘗試更新已停止的項目物件。The following example shows how to use the object to cancel the edit operation when the user tries to update a discontinued item. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
